select from sys_sequence a WHERE a.del_flag = 0

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_sequence( code, prefix, date_format, date_separator, digit_bit, suffix, `separator`, previous_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{prefix}, #{dateFormat}, #{dateSeparator}, #{digitBit}, #{suffix}, #{separator}, #{previousDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_sequence SET code = #{code}, prefix=#{prefix}, date_format=#{dateFormat}, date_separator=#{dateSeparator}, digit_bit =#{digitBit}, suffix=#{suffix}, `separator`=#{separator}, update_by=#{updateBy.id}, update_date=now(), remarks=#{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
